original_title: ビデオガール 夢中女人
overview: Tonight, Takeo chose Ryoko Mikami's "I want to be taken to that extreme. At that moment, Takeo's mind became mixed up between porn and reality, and he was hit with a feeling of pleasure that he had never experienced before... As Takeo becomes unable to distinguish between reality and porn, an incident arises.
title: Video girl: Muchû nyonin
